title: Real-Time Surveillance System Design Workshop for Coastal Accident Prevention and Control

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Marine Environment and General Safety Management Knowledge
context.additional_context: Strengthening coastal accident prevention system design capabilities through VR simulation training for current marine leisure/safety practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and classify coastal accident risk factors (such as strong currents, collisions with rocks, and marine life threats).
Learners can implement drone-based image processing workflows for real-time surveillance system design in a simulated environment.
Learners can analyze risk situations and propose response strategies using deep learning-based image detection technology.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
